subject: Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.
body:
International Monetary Fund 700 19th Street, N.W.. Washington, D.C. 20431 ;
Fax Operator: (202) 623-4661. Map of IMF

Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.

I am Ms. Kristalina Georgieva is Managing Director of the International
Monetary Fund.And Chairman of the Executive Board from October 1, 2019,

I wish to inform you that the USA Monetary Agency have earlier re-called
your Fund totally sum of ($2.5billion U.S dollars from Credit Suisse
Zurich, Switzerland and this Fund contains the exact amount which you have
been pursuing for long period of time if not getting to years, while the
re-calling of this Fund was due to Lack of Your Fund Documentation.

After series of Complain tabled to this Government about the high rate of
Scamming issue been carried out and mostly from Africans, while the most
painful issue is that we finally discovered that this Internet Hackers have
gone to the extend of telling you about the reality and existence of your
Fund and you easily fall to their victim, while in respect to the
termination of all these Scamming issues, We have
alerted your Government Embassy to quickly come and fight for your rescue
by settling the FEE for the issuance of Your Fund Documentation since that
was the main reason your real Fund has been seized and delayed.

We hereby today announce a congratulating news to you as your Government
Embassy have finally responded directly to our call and
therefore have paid accordingly for your Fund Documentation, thereby giving
you all assurance that you now have the necessary Documentation that
qualified you to respond and claim your real Fund under my care
and stop all other Communication if not from this Office.

Now that your fund have been documented, the Central Bank of USA (CBA)
Governor have agreed with Monetary Agency`s director of operation to
release your ($2.5billion)US dollars ASAP.

Your Fund approximate total sum of ($2.5billion)US dollars which have been
earlier assigned under a check is presently still in a check form worth
($2.5billion) US dollars and the USA Monetary Agency have today instructed
to delivery the check to your home address without any further delay,

After that you have to make a choice on how to receive your Fund which is
to be Through check or Bank to Bank Wire Transfer

Note; The only fee you have to pay is $200.00USD only to obtain your fund
release order certificate from supreme court, This will duly guarantee and
cover your money as being legitimately acquired from the U.S Government,

I am here giving your guarantee and also 100 % percent assurance that this
is the only money you have to pay and after that you will receive your fund
immediately. Please any delay from your side will be a very dangerous,,

Also do reconfirm the bellow information's to us.

Your Full Name.
Your Country,
State
City.
Your Available Cell Number.
Your ID or PASPORT
YOUR BANK DETAILS,

Be advised to move ahead and buy $200.
Steam wallet card or Sephora card scratch it and attached the picture to us.

Bear it in mind that after three days from today if you failed to comply by
sending this fee your fund will be divert into USA government account that
is finally,


God bless you more together with your family,

Congratulations
Yours in Service,
Sincerely,
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva

subject: Re: Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite a lot to take in, but I'm doing my best to understand it all.

I'm thrilled to hear about the fund that has been set aside for me. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. 

Firstly, could you please explain more about the role of the USA Monetary Agency in this process? Also, how did my government embassy get involved?

Secondly, you mentioned that there are two options for receiving the funds - through check or Bank to Bank Wire Transfer. Could you please elaborate on these methods? Which one would be faster and safer?

Lastly, regarding the fee for obtaining the fund release order from supreme court, could you provide more details about this process? How much is this fee and why is it necessary?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Urgent Attention
body:
Department of The U.S. Treasury
Office of the Secretary & Debt Affairs Unit
1500 Pennsylvania Avenue NW,
Washington D.C. 20220.


Urgent Attention

I am Mrs.Janet Yellen, United States Secretary of the Treasury Flag of the
Secretary of the Treasury Incumbent.

Following series of complains from Citizens of the United States as well as
Citizens of Other Countries In Europe over the Discrepancies and fraudulent
ways in which fund transfers are handled by Europe which has made it
impossible for a lot of People to claim their Winning prize or Inheritance
funds from most Europe Countries due to frauds and illegal activities, A
decision was reached recently by the United States Treasury Department
under the authority of the government to compel Europe Financial bodies
(Banks) to urgently release all funds of Asian, American and European
citizens and other geographic continents that are trapped in most Banks and
Courier Companies in Europe. It was discovered that some bureaucratic
bottlenecks was put by these Banks and Couriers to make it impossible for
beneficiaries to claim their funds so that they will fraudulently divert
those funds to their private accounts.

Consequent upon the aforementioned, I was personally mandated to handle
this matter to ensure that all funds of our Citizens and others countries
which are fraudulently being trapped in Europe Banks are urgently retrieved
and paid to the actual Beneficiaries under a legal manner. Our team of
experts were delegated to Europe for this task and we discovered your File
NO: BR360/9055767/00 as unclaimed fund.It was discovered that officials of
the Bank has only put up illegal requirements in order to make it difficult
for you to claim your fund.

The United States Department of Treasury has retrieved all Files of illegal
transactions and all has been arrested for this act . however, we will be
working under a legitimate arrangement to ensure that you follow the normal
process to receive your fund. the only required fee is the sum of $155 to
enable the Europe president signed his signature on your behalf for
immediate transfer your fund or delivery the package to your door step.

Note;for those gift cards, Be advised to buy $155 Steam wallet card or ebay
card or I Tunes card scratch it and attached the picture to us,

With your details as below for easy processing and transfer or delivery to
your home address release:

(1) Full Names:
(2) Residential Address:
(3) Country of Residence:
(4) Age:
(5) Phone/Cell Number:
(6) Occupation:
(7) Bank details
(7) your ID card

Be informed that the above information will only enable us to make due
confirmation.
I am here giving your guarantee and also 100 % percent assurance that you
must receive your fund into your bank account or delibery without delay or
any unwarranted fees.

And I want you to know that your funds valued at US$32,500,000.00 United
States Dollars) have been approved by the Treasury Department of the United
States, and I would respectfully request that you keep the contents of this
mail confidential and respect the integrity of the information you come by
as a result of this mail.

Yours in Service

Mrs.Janet Yellen
Secretary United States Treasury Department.
Main Treasury 1500 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW
Washington, D.C. 20220. USA

subject: Re: Urgent Attention
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this sounds like a big deal! I'm just an ordinary person and I've never been involved in anything like this before. It's quite overwhelming to be honest.

I'm curious though, how did you find my information? And why was my file among those you discovered in the bank? I don't recall having any dealings with European banks or courier companies. 

Also, could you please explain more about the illegal activities that were put up by these banks and couriers? It's hard for me to understand how they could divert funds to their private accounts.

You mentioned a fee required for the Europe president to sign on my behalf. How does that work exactly? And why specifically Steam wallet card or ebay card or iTunes card?

I appreciate your help in understanding all of this better. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
James
